resources.string: Please confirm you wish to delete this rule.
Please confirm you wish to inject a sample rule.
Are you sure you want to delete all these recommendations? \n\nUnless you also clear out the rule reports, they will not be generated again.
Do you wish to erase information about previous runs of this rule? \n\nIf you erase this information, the rule may run on posts it has already run on before.
Do you wish to erase information about all previous runs for this user? \n\nIf you erase this information, these rules may run on any posts they have already run on before.
As this rule has been run before, it is recommended to run it on posts that were created after the last run. Please confirm the range of posts you would like to run this rule against.
This rule has not been run before. Please confirm the range of posts you wish this rule to run over.

Unfortunately this rule failed validation with %d errors and %d warnings. 

%s 

Rules with errors will not run.

Accepting this recommendation will %s the following post in r/%s: 

%s 

You can use the button below to view the post in more detail.

Accepting this recommendation will post a comment to the following post in r/%s: 

%s 

The comment reads: 
"%s" 

You can use the button below to view the post in more detail.

Accepting this recommendation will do nothing to the following post in r/%s: 

%s 

You can use the button below to view the post in more detail.
Accepting this recommendation will enact it for you. Are you sure you wish to do this?
Rejecting this recommendation will remove it from your view. Are you sure you wish to do this?

There are currently no rules for this account. Add some rules for this account using the action button below. 

A rule has conditions and outcomes. 

When a rule's conditions are satisfied, DKB then transforms its outcomes into recommendations.

To generate recommendations, create and run rules. 

Each rule will test reddit for its conditions - and if they are satisfied, it will use the rule's outcomes to create recommendations for you that appear here. 

You can then choose to enact those recommendations.
Preparing to enact your recommendations. Please wait.
